557:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ,
557:5: sarvairarhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravairniḥkleśairvaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñairājñairājāneyairmahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyairapahṛtabhārairanuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptairekaṃ pudgalaṃ sthāpayitvā yaduta āyuṣmantamānandam||
557:6: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayate sma-pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitā niryāyuriti||
557:7: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat-kimayamāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira ātmīyena svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupadekṣyati utāho buddhānubhāveneti?
557:8: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya imamevarūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-yatkiṃcidāyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakā bhāṣante deśayanti upadiśanti udīrayanti prakāśayanti saṃprakāśayanti,
557:12: tatra dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāste tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti dhārayanti,
557:13: tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtya dhārayitvā yadyadeva bhāṣante,
557:20: tathāgatadharmadeśanāyā eva āyuṣman śāriputra eṣa niṣyandaḥ yatte kulaputrā upadiśantastāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na virodhayanti||
557:21: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena bhagavantametadavocat-yadbhagavānevamāha-pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ niryāyuriti|
557:24: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaduta bodhisattva iti|
557:25: tamapyahaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yaduta prajñāpāramitā nāma|
557:26: so'haṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ vā bodhisattvadharmaṃ vā avindan anupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan,
557:27: prajñāpāramitāmapyavindan anupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
557:28: api tu khalu punarbhagavan sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne upadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
557:37: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvayatā evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yathā asau śikṣyamāṇastenāpi bodhicittena na manyeta|
557:41: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam?
557:42: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā acittatā,
557:43: tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
557:45: subhūtirāha-sacedāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
557:46: api nu te yukta eṣa paryanuyogo bhavati yadāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha-asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti?
557:47: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kā punareṣā āyuṣman subhūte acittatā ?
557:49: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhvāyuṣman subhūte|
557:50: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi|
557:53: śrāvakabhūmāvapi śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā|
557:55: pratyekabuddhabhūmāvapi śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā|
557:57: bodhisattvabhūmāvapi śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā|
557:60: ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabodhisattvadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,
557:62: anuttarāyāmapi samyaksaṃbodhau śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā|
557:65: ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabuddha dharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,
557:67: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yo'haṃ bhagavan etadeva bodhisattvanāmadheyaṃ na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
557:68: prajñāpāramitāmapi na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi|
557:69: so'haṃ bhagavan etadeva bodhisattvanāmadheyamavindan anupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan prajñāpāramitāmapi avindan anupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
557:71: yo'haṃ vastvavindan anupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇa āyavyayaṃ kuryāṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti|
557:72: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstadapi nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam|
557:75: evaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam|
557:76: sacedbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
557:80: adhimucyate'dhyāśayena avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ,
557:83: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
557:94: na hi abhisaṃskāre caran prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
557:97: aparipūrayamāṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ na niryāsyati sarvajñatāyāmaparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhṇan|
557:108: evaṃ hyatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam|
557:109: ayaṃ ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāparigṛhīto nāma samādhirvipulaḥ puraskṛtaḥ apramāṇaniyato'sādhāraṇaḥ|
557:114: tatra hi śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ sarvajñajñāne adhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ|
557:116: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān|
557:129: so'tra sarvatra śraddhānusārī sarvajñajñāne dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya evamadhimukta iti|
557:134: iyamapi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā yadrūpaṃ na parigṛhṇīte |
557:139: tasmādiyamapi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā||
557:140: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evamupaparīkṣitavyamevamupanidhyātavyam-katamaiṣā prajñāpāramitā?
557:142: kiṃ yo dharmo na vidyate nopalabhyate,
557:144: sacedevamupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ evamupanidhyāyan nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
557:149: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kiṃ kāraṇamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā veditavyaḥ?
557:151: evaṃ yadā vedanaiva saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva,
557:155: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-etametadāyuṣman śāriputra evametat|
557:165: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'tra śikṣiṣyate,
557:172: evaṃ carata āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñatā āsannībhavati|
557:176: evaṃ ca punarāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvajñatāyā āsannībhavati||
557:195: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati|
557:214: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati|
557:220: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kathaṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
557:221: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
557:230: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu|
557:246: carāmi ca na carāmi ceti nopaiti,
557:247: naiva carāmi na na carāmīti nopaiti,
557:250: cariṣyāmi ca na cariṣyāmi ceti nopaiti,
557:256: anenaiva samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate||
557:257: buddhānubhāvena āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha-vyākṛto'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
557:260: na ca tena samādhinā manyate-ahaṃ samāhitaḥ,
557:265: evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃvidyate||
557:266: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-katamenāyuṣman subhūte samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairvyākriyate'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
557:270: tamapi hi sa kulaputraḥ samādhiṃ na jānāti,
557:272: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha-na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman subhūte vadasi?
557:273: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha-na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman śāriputra vadāmi|
557:275: avidyamānatvena tasya samādhestaṃ samādhiṃ na jānāti na saṃjānīte|
557:276: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu subhūte|
557:282: evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate||
557:283: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate?
557:284: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate||
557:285: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ katamasmin dharme śikṣate?
557:286: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣate|
557:288: na hi te śāriputra dharmāstathā saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā aśrutavanto'bhiniviṣṭāḥ|
557:289: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha-kathaṃ tarhi te bhagavan saṃvidyante?
557:295: te tān kalpayitvā dvayorantayoḥ saktāḥ tān dharmānna jānanti na paśyanti|
557:297: kalpayitvā dvāvantāvabhiniviśante abhiniviśya tannidānamupalambhaṃ niśritya atītān dharmān kalpayanti,
557:299: pratyutpannān dharmān kalpayanti te kalpayitvā nāmarūpe'bhiniviṣṭāḥ|
557:301: te tānasaṃvidyamānān sarvadharmān kalpayanto yathābhūtaṃ mārgaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti|
557:304: tena te bālā iti saṃjñāṃ gacchanti|
557:306: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśante||
557:307: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate?
557:308: bhagavānāha-evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāmapi na śikṣate|
557:309: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate|
557:310: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
557:313: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yo bhagavan evaṃ paripṛcchet-kimayaṃ māyāpuruṣāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate,
557:316: tasya bhagavan evaṃ paripṛcchataḥ kathaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ syāt?
557:317: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tena hi subhūte tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi|
557:321: bhagavānetadavocat-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte anyā sā māyā,
557:330: na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadrūpam|
557:333: na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyā sā vedanā,
557:334: anyā sā saṃjñā anye te saṃskārāḥ|
557:335: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā eva bhagavan māyā,
557:337: na bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadvijñānam|
557:340: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte atraiṣāṃ saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu yaduta bodhisattva iti?
557:343: tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena māyāpuruṣeṇeva śikṣitavyaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
557:345: sa eva hi bhagavan māyāpuruṣo dhārayitavyo yaduta pañcopādānaskandhāḥ|
557:347: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ rūpamuktaṃ bhagavatā|
557:348: yacca rūpaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ|
557:349: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā uktāḥ|
557:350: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ vijñānamuktaṃ bhagavatā|
557:351: yacca vijñānaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ|
557:352: mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante|
557:353: bhagavānāha-yadi subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pāpamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti,
557:355: atha cetsubhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti,
557:357: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kāni punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni?
557:363: imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni|
557:364: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yadbhagavānevamāha-imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyānīti|
557:366: tatra bodhisattva iti bhagavan kaḥ padārtha?
557:369: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'saktatāyāṃ śikṣate|
557:370: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nubodhanārthena asaktatāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate|
557:371: bodhyarthena tu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate|
557:373: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate?
557:376: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-mamāpi bhagavan pratibhātiyenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate|
557:377: bhagavānāha-pratibhātu te śāriputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase|
557:378: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha-mahatyā ātmadṛṣṭyāḥ sattvadṛṣṭyāḥ jīvadṛṣṭyāḥ pudgala dṛṣṭyāḥ bhavadṛṣṭyāḥ vibhavadṛṣṭyāḥ ucchedadṛṣṭyāḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭyāḥ svakāyadṛṣṭyāḥ,
557:381: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate|
557:382: bhagavānāha-pratibhātu te subhūte yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase|
557:384: yadapi tadbhagavan bodhicittaṃ sarvajñatācittamanāsravaṃ cittamasamaṃ cittaṃ asamasamaṃ cittamasādhāraṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ,
557:390: tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati||
557:391: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte tatrāpi citte asakto'paryāpannaḥ?
557:393: śāriputra āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam?
557:394: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
557:396: subhūtirāha-tadyadi āyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
557:399: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi||
557:400: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat-mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
557:403: tasmātsa mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati||
557:404: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃnaddha iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
557:405: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho bhavati ?
557:406: bhagavānāha-iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati-aprameyā mayā sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti|
557:408: na ca te santi yairye parinirvāpayitavyā iti|
557:410: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati|
557:413: yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākaro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyamabhinirmimīte|
557:415: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tatra kenacitkaściddhato vā mṛto vā nāśito vā antarhito vā?
557:417: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayati|
557:418: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati|
557:419: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśamevaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ śrutvā notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
557:420: iyatā ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho veditavyaḥ||
557:421: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
557:422: tathā asaṃnāhasaṃnaddho batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ|
557:426: akṛtā hi subhūte sarvajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā|
557:438: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-rūpamāyuṣman subhūte abaddhamamuktamiti vadasi|
557:441: rūpatathatāpi āyuṣman subhūte abaddhā amukteti vadasi|
557:444: atha katamattadāyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yadrūpamabaddhamamuktamiti vadasi?
557:449: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte rūpatathatā yā rūpatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
557:450: evaṃ katamā sā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā?
557:451: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte vijñānatathatā yā vijñānatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
557:452: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputrametadavocat-yadāyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpaṃ tadabaddhamamuktam |
557:457: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā|
557:458: evaṃ yā māyāpuruṣasya vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā|
557:459: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya vijñānatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā|
557:464: ayaṃ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya mahāsaṃnāho'saṃnāhaḥ|
557:466: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ san mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati|
557:473: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-mahāyānamiti subhūte aprameyatāyā etadadhivacanam|
557:475: yadapi subhūte evaṃ vadasi-kathaṃ vā tatsaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ?
557:489: nāpi kaścittena mahāyānena niryāto nāpi niryāsyati nāpi niryāti|
557:494: evamavidyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati?
557:495: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati||
557:499: evameva bhagavan asmin yāne aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmavakāśaḥ|
557:500: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāyānamidaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām|
557:504: evamasya bhagavan mahāyānasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate,
557:509: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu subhūte|
557:514: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat-ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo'dhīṣṭo mahāyānamupadeṣṭavyaṃ manyate|
557:515: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-nāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānamavocam|
557:519: api nu khalu punarbhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
557:531: evaṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvadharmamanupalabhamāno nāhaṃ bhagavan taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasyaitannāmadheyaṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti|
557:534: so'haṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ taṃ dharmamanupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan katamaṃ dharmaṃ katamena dharmeṇa katamasmin dharme'vavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
557:548: na cānyatra bhagavan anabhinirvṛttitaḥ sarvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā upalabhyante,
557:550: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ deśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
557:551: nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
557:557: yasmin hi samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imān dharmān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyupaparīkṣate,
557:562: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān|
557:568: tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam|
557:574: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām|
557:575: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
557:581: evaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ tasmin samaye na rūpamupaiti,
557:585: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān|
557:591: tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam|
557:597: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām|
557:598: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
557:604: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tena hi yathāhamāyuṣmataḥ subhūterbhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
557:606: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo'pyanutpādaḥ kiṃ bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati?
557:607: yāni vā tāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo duḥkhānyutsahate pratyanubhavitum?
557:608: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantam nāpi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo duṣkarasaṃjñayā carati|
557:610: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ janayitvā śakyo'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kartum|
557:612: sarvasattvānāmantike mātṛsaṃjñāṃ pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā strīpuruṣeṣu|
557:613: evametāḥ saṃjñāḥ kṛtvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati|
557:614: tasmānmātṛsaṃjñā pitṛsaṃjñā putrasaṃjñā duhitṛsaṃjñā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike yāvadātmasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā|
557:615: yathā ātmā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyaḥ,
557:616: evaṃ sarvasattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyā iti|
557:617: evaṃ ca sarvasattveṣu saṃjñā utpādayitavyā-mayaite sarvasattvā na parityaktavyāḥ|
557:619: na ca mayaiteṣu cittapradoṣa utpādayitavya antaśaḥ śataśo'pi chidyamāneneti|
557:620: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittamutpādayitavyam sacedevaṃcitto vihariṣyati,
557:623: punaraparamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-yathā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvamātmā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
557:624: evaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante|
557:632: śāriputra āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattva evānutpādaḥ,
557:634: subhūtirāha-bodhisattvadharmā api āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ śāriputra āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvadharmā evānutpādaḥ,
557:646: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-yadyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo'pyanutpādaḥ,
557:652: nanvāyuṣman subhūte anuprāptaiva ayatnena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvajñatā bhavati|
557:653: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptimicchāmi,
557:656: āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate,
557:657: utāho utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate ?
557:658: āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anutpanno dharma utpannaḥ,
557:660: āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte utpāda eva dharmo'nutpādaḥ,
557:662: āha-utpādo dharmo'nutpādo dharma ityāyuṣman śāriputra na pratibhāti jalpitum |
557:663: āha-anutpādo'pi te āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti jalpitum|
557:668: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-dhārmakathikānāmāyuṣmān subhūtiragratāyāṃ sthāpitavyaḥ|
557:670: tathā hyāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripraśnīkriyate,
557:674: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-dharmataiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāmaniśritadharmāṇām|
557:681: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte|
557:685: iti hi yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmevaṃ deśyamānāyāmevamupadiśyamānāyāṃ na bhavati cittasya avalīnatvam,
557:689: veditavyamayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti||
557:690: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kathamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
557:692: yadi hyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
557:694: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati,
557:696: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte manasikāreṇāvirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
557:698: evaṃ sati sarvasattvā apyavirahitā bhaviṣyanti prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa|
557:701: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra|
557:703: artha eva tvāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ|
557:711: anena āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃrūpeṇa manasikāreṇa icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ viharantamanena vihāreṇeti||
